Package entity.character.hero

Class Hero

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.character.Character
entity.character.hero.Hero
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArmorUser, WeaponUser
Direct Known Subclasses:
Barbarian, Dwarf, Elf, Wizard
public abstract class Hero
extends Character
implements ArmorUser
Parent class for any kind of Hero that can be created at the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hero

      public Hero​(Map map, int x, int y, java.lang.String sprite, int bodyPoints, int attackDice, int defenseDice, int movementDice, int mindPoints, java.lang.String name)
      Constructor method for hero parent class.
      Parameters:
      map - map where game is played
      x - starting column
      y - starting row
      sprite - sprite used for visualization
      bodyPoints - int value of health
      attackDice - int amount of dices rolled on attack
      defenseDice - int amount of dices rolled on defense
      movementDice - int amount of dices rolled for movement
      mindPoints - int amount of intelligence points
      name - hero's name

    • setEquippedWeapon

      public void setEquippedWeapon​(int weaponIndexInBag, OccupiedHand usedHand) throws InvalidItemException
      Implementation of interface method, set used weapon to selected hand
      Parameters:
      weaponIndexInBag - int index from hero's bag
      usedHand - selected hand to equip weapon
      Throws:
      InvalidItemException - thrown when an item that is not a weapon is selected to be equipped
